issue.title: DeletingPods  With no errors ... for several hours

content.raw: When I’ve previously experimented with startup/tear down of containers on Cloudsim I noted it took about 7-10 minutes to startup and for my run to actually begin whereas I never timed the tear down nearly as precisely but it certainly did not take hours but this was before the additional logging capabilities were adding \(which could be contributing to the increase in time spent `DeletingPods`\).
content.html: When I’ve previously experimented with startup/tear down of containers on Cloudsim I noted it took about 7-10 minutes to startup and for my run to actually begin whereas I never timed the tear down nearly as precisely but it certainly did not take hours but this was before the additional logging capabilities were adding (which could be contributing to the increase in time spent DeletingPods).
